code: import axios from"axios";var baseURL="/api/persons";var getPersons=function getPersons(){var request=axios.get(baseURL);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var createPerson=function createPerson(newPerson){var request=axios.post(baseURL,newPerson);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deletePerson=function deletePerson(personId){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/").concat(personId));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var updatePerson=function updatePerson(personId,newPerson){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseURL,"/").concat(personId),newPerson);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getPersons:getPersons,createPerson:createPerson,deletePerson:deletePerson,updatePerson:updatePerson};
